editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project â€œThe Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
grangs nyung pa dgag pa ni blo chung ngur gyur kyang mchog du rlom pa kha cig The author of this view is identified as Me dig pa (ID:4207) in (ID:5507). mi srid pa ni mtshon bya la ye med pa dang ma khyab pa phyogs cig la med pa dang khyab ches gzhan la'ang zhugs pa yin pas de gsum du nges te |
mtshan nyid yin pa la de gsum dang bral dgos pa dang de gsum dang ma bral na mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro | de gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma nges so zhes zer ba | de'i ltar na mtshan nyid kyi skyon mi srid pa dang khyab ches pa gnyis su nges te mtshan nyid yin pa la de gnyis dang bral dgos pa'i phyir dang de gnyis dang ma bral na mtshan nyid
ma yin pa'i phyir ro |

yang blo ldan bzang pos gzung yul dang 'jug yul gang gis
kyang khyad par du ma byas pa'i yul bden pa dang ldan pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid du 'dod do |

blo ldan bzang pos the tsom dang ldan pa'i gzhi la shes 'dod 'jug rung du brjod pa'ang phyir rgol bsgrub bya'i chos la log rtogs dang ldan pa dang yid dpyod kyi nges pa dang blo kha ma phyogs pa'i gzhi la ma khyab pa dang | bsgrub bya'i chos la log
rtogs med na thal ba'i rtags ma grub la log rtogs yod na rang rgyud la shes 'dod med par 'gyur bas bsgrub pa'i thal 'gyur rgyun chad par yang 'gyur ro ||

bdag cag gi bla ma
dag dpe la yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pa'i shugs la mnyan bya'i yod pa la 'ang mi rtag pas ma khyab pa'i dogs pa mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshul gyis chod pas rjes 'gro dang gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog pa gnyi ga bsgrub bya ma grub pa'i snga rol du nges su rung par gsung mod kyi | 'dir gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog khyab nges par sgrub pa dang | rjes 'gro nges pa dgag pa gnyis kyis
nges par bya'o |
bdag cag gi bla ma kha cig yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pas sgra'i yod pa la mi rtag pas khyab pa shugs la grub par smra te |
dang po ni bdag cag gi bla ma dag bsgrub bya ni gnyis te | rtags kyi nus pa'i yul gyi bsgrub bya dang | skyon yon bsam pa'i bsgrub bya'o ||

yang blo ldan bzang pos rlom yul gyi bsgrub bya ba lang gi brda'i
rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin la nog dang lkog shal la rlom yul gyi bsgrub byas khyab pa'ang 'dod pas spyod pa'i brda' lan cig zhugs pas nges pa yin no |

tshad ma yid kyi mun pa sel pa zhes bya ba blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i gzhung 'jig pa brtul zhugs mchog la legs par gnas pa'i dge slong chos kyi seng ges nye bar sbyar ba || rdzogs s+hO || ||

mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas bsod nams dpal gyis brjid ||
legs gsungs dgongs 'grel chos kyi rin chen mdzod ||
dam pa'i 'phreng mdzes dge legs gang chen mtsho' ||
bri'u las gtsug lag khang du bdag gis bris || dge zhing bkris ||
